text: ion.        Sometimes a mature or immature teratoma also has malignant cells. The teratoma and malignant cells may need to be treated differently.    Regular follow-up exams with imaging tests and the alpha-fetoprotein (AFP) tumor marker test will be done for at least 3 years.   Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with childhood teratoma.
